DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal healthy woman healthy men Age > 50 yr Written inform consent prior study participation Known allergy nut Evidence alcohol ( woman > 70g/week , men > 140g/week ) , tabacco drug abuse Obesity â‰¥35 kg/m2 Diabetes mellitus Hypertension > 140/90 mmHg history hypertension LDLcholesterol > 190 mg/dl , Triglycerides > 350 mg/dl History atherosclerotic disease Liver disease etiology Kidney disease etiology ( GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73 ) Uncontrolled thyroid disease endocrine diseases Acute chronic inflammatory disease Active malignancy Current previous ( within 3 month ) treatment antidiabetic drug , hypolipidemic drug , antihypertensive drug , antiinflammatory drug , vitamin E , hormonal replacement therapy major surgical intervention within 3 month ( plan )
